snippet.title: PixARK - Official Trailer!
snippet.description:
Get ready to enter an ever-changing world of dinosaurs, mysteries, and cubes in the fantastic world of PixARK!

Coming to you from Snail Games, PixARK will first launch on PC and Xbox One in Early Access / Xbox Game Preview in March 2018 before heading to PS4 and Nintendo Switch later this year!

For all the latest PixARK news, screenshots, trailers, and previews, be sure to follow Snail Games USA:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/OfficialPixARK

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/officialsnailgamesusa

Purchase on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/593600/PixARK/

Purchase on XBOX Game Preview: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/pixark-game-preview/9nzfhmfdh9sq?rtc=1
